definitions.definition: A wide steel bar with premeasured weights affixed to either end, with the central span open for the hands of the weightlifter .
A piece of jewellery composed of a straight bar with a bead on each end, used as a piercing .

main_definition: A wide steel bar with premeasured weights affixed to either end, with the central span open for the hands of the weightlifter .
secondary_definitions: A piece of jewellery composed of a straight bar with a bead on each end, used as a piercing .
